title: Enhancing Teaching Methodology Competencies: Social Problem-Solving Skills Through Computer-Based Program Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can perform explicit response-construction tasks in computer-based learning modules with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can produce project deliverables that incorporate program learning outcomes in social phenomenon analysis at over 70% utilization.
Learners can analyze five or more socially relevant issues presented in the program learning process using a critical thinking framework.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
